description: Lead the finance function for a mid-sized manufacturing firm. Oversee financial planning, reporting, treasury, and team management while ensuring regulatory compliance and supporting strategic initiatives.
responsibilities: Manage financial planning, budgeting and forecasting; oversee month-end and year-end close; prepare consolidated financial statements; manage cash flow and working capital; lead a team of 3-5 finance professionals; coordinate audits and tax filings; implement financial controls and process improvements; provide financial insights to executive leadership.
